plan_comparison.chart.password_protectio.string: Set a password on files to control your work’s visibility.

plan_comparison.chart.default_roles.deta.string: Set a default role for new team members to control plan costs.

plan_comparison.chart.shared_fonts.detai.string: Put your organization’s fonts in Figma for everyone to use.

plan_comparison.chart.centralized_admin..string: Bring multiple teams together under one central Figma account; manage users and billing in one place.

plan_comparison.chart.domain_capture.det.string: Automatically add anyone with a verified email address to your organization.

plan_comparison.chart.link_access_contro.string: Limit sharing files outside your organization.

plan_comparison.chart.centralized_conten.string: All files and drafts are owned by your organization and recoverable at any time.

plan_comparison.chart.activity_logs.deta.string: See how your team is using Figma.

plan_comparison.chart.plugin_widget_mana.string: Approve and manage plugin and widget approval requests from your team.

plan_comparison.chart.dev_mode_v2.detail.string: Dev Mode is a new space in Figma for developers with features that help you translate design into code, faster.

plan_comparison.chart.audio_conversation.string: Talk with collaborators about your work while in your files.

plan_comparison.chart.design_system_anal.string: Track usage metrics to measure your design system’s impact.

plan_comparison.chart.single_sign_on_v2..string: Set up SAML single sign-on, enforce SSO for all team members, and manage provisioning via SCIM.

plan_comparison.chart.private_plugins_v2.string: Create private plugins for your organization to use.

plan_comparison.chart.custom_color_palet.string: Set your brand colors as default when working in a {figJamCallout}.

plan_comparison.chart.custom_templates_v.string: Make your own {figJamCallout} templates and share them with your organization.

plan_comparison.chart.open_sessions.deta.string: Invite anyone to join your {figJamCallout} for 24 hours—with no login needed, and unlimited sessions.

plan_comparison.chart.voting.details_wit.string: Vote on ideas right in your {figJamCallout}.
